reviewText: My toddler is going through a Peppa Pig phase or at least she was (She told me this morning she was tired or Peppa Pig LOL). This video didn't really keep her interested for some reason. She watched a few minutes of it on a plane trip but then didn't seem interested any more.
Everyone loved the story.
It's Peppa Pig. My kids love it.  Totally saw that coming.
My daughter loves peppa! Need more dvds :) this was shipped very quickly.

My kids have been obsessed with Peppa Pig from the moment they saw it so the arrival of a new DVD is always met with excitement! The Balloon Ride arrived at the perfect time because all three of my kids were sick. It was time for a Peppa-Pig-Athon. With twelve episodes, this was the perfect medicine for them!

The thing I love about watching Peppa Pig with my kids is that they find it hilarious so there is constant hysterical laughing. I find it all a bit silly and a wee bit annoying but those same snorts and farts that get an eye roll from me have my kids erupting in laughter so I laugh along with them. The Balloon Ride actually was my kids favorite episode and of course they liked George Catches a Cold because they were all down with a cold so they could relate!

I thought The Baby Piggy was adorable and Georges Birthday was a hit with my kids, as all things birthday are! My middle child just celebrated her fifth birthday so of course all things birthday are relatable to her right now. While Peppa Pig is full of silliness and can be a bit crude at times, as piggies are, it is also very family oriented and thats the thing I appreciate the most. These little piggies are a close knit family and while many kids shows focus on the kids alone; this show is a stand-out as one thats all about family.

This is a DVD full of Peppa Pig and her friends and family.  The episodes are quick, about 10 minutes each, but they are cute and kid-friendly.  The lessons are great for kids and simple enough to understand.  They are episodes that have previously aired on Nick Jr. but are great to have in one DVD so kids can watch anytime they miss Peppa.
The episodes include:

The Balloon Ride
The Cycle Ride
Whistling
George's Birthday
Ice Skating
Painting
The Baby Piggy
Very Hot Day
Daddy's Movie Camera
Dr. Hamster's Tortoise
The New Car
George Catches a Cold

This DVD is a MUST if your kids love Peppa Pig and are constantly asking you to watch the show! We've recorded the individual shows when they come on TV before, but it's SO annoying to have to fast forward to the start of the show, just for it to be over in 20 minutes -- and then your kids ask for another show to watch.  This DVD has 10 episodes and runs for 60 minutes!  Do you know how much a mom can get done in that time?!?  This is probably one of the best purchases I've made for my kids!
